channel.title: Saving help. characters being reseted
channel.description: I'm using JordieScape source. i ran the server just fine. The server crashes every 40 mins or so. But when it crashes theres atleast 1 or 2 people that has their profile reseted. Whether it be a person who's played for a day or a person that just started. is there anyway to solve this? or just prevent it by making an auto reseter with a message saying "log out in 1 minute or account may be in risk of being reseted!"? or logging out wouldn't make a difference? Well any help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks. :D

item.title: Saving help. characters being reseted
item.dc:creator: @jeremie9299 jeremie9299
item.description:
@jeremie9299 wrote:

I’m using JordieScape source.
i ran the server just fine.
The server crashes every 40 mins or so.
But when it crashes theres atleast 1 or 2 people that has their profile reseted.
Whether it be a person who’s played for a day or a person that just started.
is there anyway to solve this?
or just prevent it by making an auto reseter with a message saying “log out in 1 minute or account may be in risk of being reseted!”?
or logging out wouldn’t make a difference?
Well any help would be greatly appreciated.
Thanks.
